name: Socrates
body:
Welcome. I'm Socrates, maxsu's computer system. Right now this place is just an issue/task system for fixing annoying problems on me. Eventually I'll have a configuration system, live partly on the cloud, and have a lot fewer tiny problems, and hopefully larger problems, which I'll solve for clients.

#### Goals: 
##### Implement Configuration Control.
##### Keep a Captain's Log of system maneuvers.
##### Capture and dispatch nagging problems.
##### Document problem solutions.
##### Grow up into a real boy!

#### Utility Links
#### [Project management page.](https://github.com/maxsu/socrates)
#### [The project's Huboard.](http://huboard.com/maxsu/socrates/board)
#### [Create a new issue!](https://github.com/maxsu/socrates/issues/new)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
